#include <stdio.h>
int main(void)
{
    int a=0,b=0,sum=0,carry=0,temp=0;
    scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
    while(a!=0 && b!=0)
    {
        carry=0;
        temp=0;
        sum=0;
        while(a>0 && b>0)
        {
            sum=a%10+b%10+temp;
            if(sum>9)
            {
                temp=1;
                carry++;
            }
            else
                temp=0;
            a/=10;
            b/=10;
        }
        a=a>b?a:b;
        while(a>0)
        {
            sum=a%10+temp;
            if(sum>9)
            {
                temp=1;
                carry++;
            }
            else
                temp=0;
            a/=10;
        }
        switch(carry)
        {
            case 0 : printf("No carry operation.\n"); break;
            case 1 : printf("1 carry operation.\n"); break;
            default : printf("%d carry operations.\n",carry); break;
        }
        scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
    }
}
